title: RPG Journey: Overworld Music (Vol. I)
description: Inspired by classic RPG games, this pack contains 14 tracks filled with acoustic guitar rhythms and epic orchestral scores
longDescription:
This pack contains 14 tracks which can be used as overworld and town music for games of (almost) any genre! Inspired by classic RPG games, the tracks contained herein include energetic acoustic guitar rhythms, graceful violin melodies and intricate percussion rhythms.


Audio Preview

technicalDetails:
Features: Includes 13 loopable tracks (with alternate non-loopable versions for 2 of the tracks, and one extra non-loopable track)

Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Number of Audio Cues: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 28

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
